Talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0200>I'm hard at work investigating, despite
this rain.
Near0002: I wonder if Robbie is OK...
Near0003: Hard to see in the rain...
Talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseM>Hey! I told you! Don't sneak up behind
someone when they're standing at the
edge of a chasm!
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0901>Chasm investigation <clr:ffff>is super important
right now to the Zonai Survey Team.

If even one researcher had to stop,
<clr:0000>Josha<clr:ffff>—who's hard at work on plans over
at <clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>—would cry! NOT OK!
Talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>HEY! <sp:5:0:0>What's the big idea!<sp:5:0:0> You can't
just walk up behind someone who's
standing on the edge of a chasm!
My <clr:0000>colleague<clr:ffff> who works with me on the
<clr:0000>Zonai Survey Team <clr:ffff>is down there.

What would happen if I slipped and fell on
him, huh? HUH!
Talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>She's a genius. Such a genius, in fact,
that they say she's the next up-and-
coming Purah.
She's in charge of the Depths and the
<clr:0000>chasm investigation team<clr:ffff>.

But even so, Josha's still a kid, and
there's no telling what dangers are
down there.
As such, she's not allowed into the
Depths, so our <clr:0000>Zonai Survey Team<clr:ffff>
is helping with the investigation.
Talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_00>I TOLD you. Don't go walking up behind
someone standing on the edge of
a chasm!
My <clr:0000>colleague<clr:ffff> who works with me on the
<clr:0000>Zonai Survey Team <clr:ffff>is down there.

What would happen if I slipped and fell on
him, huh? HUH!
Talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_00>HEY. <sp:5:1:0>You again?! I told you not to sneak
up on me!<sp:5:0:0> Can't you see I'm right on the
edge of this chasm?
My <clr:0000>colleague<clr:ffff> who works with me on the
<clr:0000>Zonai Survey Team <clr:ffff>is down there.

What would happen if I slipped and fell on
him, huh? HUH!
Talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0400>Hey, buddy! <sp:5:0:0>What's the big idea!<sp:5:0:0> You
can't just walk up behind someone who's
standing on the edge of a chasm!
For one thing, a nasty accident like that
would surely halt the research here!

<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:WorkHeavy_00>Chasm investigation <clr:ffff>is super important
right now for the Zonai Survey Team.

If even one researcher had to stop,
<clr:0000>Josha<clr:ffff>—who's hard at work on plans over
at <clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>—would cry! NOT OK!
Talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0200>I'm very busy with my investigation,
no matter how much I'd prefer to be
in bed right now.
Talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You know, the giant holes that showed up
after <clr:0000>the Upheaval<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0> There are lots of them
just like this one all over the world.
You can't see the bottom, they're so
deep—so filled with MYSTERY.

We must continue our research for the
sake of our dear <clr:0000>Josha<clr:ffff>!
Talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>See that tower over there?<sp:5:0:0>


That's where you'll find our base of
operations and, incidentally, Josha.
Talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0200>I'm deep in my investigation work at
the moment.
